title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.4 - Residence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.4 - Residence

State Regulations

For purposes of article 16 of the

Judiciary Law and this Part, a resident of a county or municipality shall mean
a person who maintains a fixed permanent and principal home within that county
or municipality to which such person, wherever temporarily located, always
intends to return. Among the factors that may be considered in determining the
principal home is the relative proportion of time in the year that the person
customarily resides in the county or municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
128.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
